thread.title: Marketing Operations Associate - London - Sports Management
thread.title_full: Marketing Operations Associate - London - Sports Management

title: Marketing Operations Associate - London - Sports Management
text: Posted/Updated: 10-14-2015 Brief Job Description: Conduct research into competition, as that definition may evolve, to help us understand our strengths, weaknesses, opportunities and threats.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
